#include<iostream>
#include<string>
using namespace std;
int main()
{
	long long int i,t,j,k,n,z,o,c1,c2;
	string a,b;
	cin>>t;
	for(k=0;k<t;k++)
	{
		z=0;
		o=0;
		c1=0;
		c2=0;
		cin>>a>>b;
		for(i=0;i<a.length();i++)
		{
			if((a[i]=='0')&&(b[i]=='1'))
				o++;
			else if((a[i]=='1')&&(b[i]=='0'))
				z++;
				
			if(a[i]=='0')
				c1=1;
			else
				c2=1;
		}
		if((c1==1)&&(c2==1))
			cout<<"Lucky Chef\n"<<max(z,o)<<endl;
		else
			cout<<"Unlucky Chef"<<endl;
	}
}
